DOC.brief_summary: This study aim improve survival rate out-of-hospital cardiac arrest patient 2 % bundle three intervention measure include : 1 ) dispatcher-assisted CPR , 2 ) multi-tiered response team CPR , 3 ) feedback CPR .
DOC.brief_title: Implementation Gold Standard EMS CPR Programs 2 % Improvement Survival Rates Out-of-Hospital Cardiac Arrest Metropolitan City
DOC.detailed_description: The project aim implement gold standard emergency medical service ( EMS ) cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ) program , result increase bystander CPR , reduce EMS response time , high quality CPR prehospital resuscitation bundle approach include 1 ) dispatcher-assisted CPR ( DA-CPR ) , 2 ) multi-tiered response team CPR , 3 ) feedback CPR . The DA-CPR program aim contribute improve bystander CPR rate reduce EMS response time interval rigorous monitoring cardiac arrest detection primary call receiving stage well increased number dispatcher-assisted CPR instruction initiation target time 90 second . The Team CPR protocol render synergetic effort among participate EMS personnel basic life support ( BLS ) advance life support ( ALS ) unit within new tiered dispatch system subsequently deliver uninterrupted CPR out-of-hospital cardiac arrest ( OHCA ) patient hospital arrival . The feedback CPR monitoring quality assurance program contribute high quality CPR deliver patient scene well transport .
DOC.criteria: EMSassessed OHCA Cardiac etiology Above 18 year age Patients receive EMS resuscitation Patients sign evident death ( decapitation , evident livor mortis rigor mortis ) DoNotResuscitate case Pregnant patient Patients mechanical device apply
